title: Reincarnated Swordmaster - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Shounen   Supernatural   Wuxia

description:
Should an untalented guy like me die?


Then I’m going to die.

I will die as you so desire.

After dying, I will challenge the world again.


Until I kill this trash-like world!>
